WELCOME_MESSAGE_LN_1: Welcome to Luke Vella's Clock Patience simulator! (Patent yet pending).
WELCOME_MESSAGE_LN_2: The game is simple. Firstly, input the amount of decks you wish to play with or play with the sample data attached to this assignment.
WELCOME_MESSAGE_LN_3: The simulator will then simulate the clock patience game using the input provided, and will output the results of each of the games.
GAME_START_MESSAGE_1: A new game has now started.
GAME_START_MESSAGE_2: Please input the amount of decks you would like to seed into the clock patience game.
GAME_START_MESSAGE_3: Alternatively, type 'sample input' to use the input which has been attached to this technical assignment.
SAMPLE_DATA_CHOSEN_MESSAGE_1: You have opted to use the sample data for this game.
SAMPLE_DATA_CHOSEN_MESSAGE_2: After all the work I went through to seed random decks...
SAMPLE_DATA_CHOSEN_MESSAGE_3: To each his own, I guess. Using sample data.
INPUT_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_DECKS: Invalid entry. Please enter a valid number of decks or 'sample input' to continue.
SHOWING_ALL_DECKS_MESSAGE: You will now be shown all decks arranged in four lines of 13 cards, each card separated by a single blank space.
GAME_ABOUT_TO_BE_PLAYED_MESSAGE_1: The game of Clock Patience will now be played using the input provided.
GAME_ABOUT_TO_BE_PLAYED_MESSAGE_2: After the game is concluded, the outcome of each game will be output below.
STATISTICS_MESSAGE: Out of {0} hands, you have won {1} times.
CONSOLE_PLAYER_MESSAGE: Oh well. Better luck next time!
ASK_RESTART_GAME_MESSAGE: Would you like to play again? (Y/N)
